docs.lead_paragraph: Mayor La Guardia and his official family received a warm welcome from Bronx residents yesterday afternoon when he moved the headquarters of city government to the century-old Bartow mansion in Pelham Bay Park.

headline.main: MAYOR OCCUPIES SUMMER CITY HALL; Bronx Gives Warm Welcome as He Crosses Harlem River to Pelham Bay Park. FOUR OFFICIALS SWORN IN Delaney and Sullivan Take Oath on Reappointment to Transportation Board. MAYOR LA GUARDIA SPENDS A BUSY DAY BETWEEN THE WINTER AND SUMMER CITY HALLS MAYOR OCCUPIES SUMMER CITY HALL

docs.abstract: Administers oath of office to B Kozicke, Special Sessions judge
docs.snippet: Mayor La Guardia and his official family received a warm welcome from Bronx residents yesterday afternoon when he moved the headquarters of city government to the century-old Bartow mansion in Pelham Bay Park.
